author: Eric Levitz
title: Coronavirus Is Forcing the GOP to Admit Its Ideology Is Delusional
description: Trump’s DHS declares undocumented workers “essential,” while Steve Mnuchin scrambles to reconstruct the “administrative state.”
content: As the coronavirus pandemic shutters Americas storefronts and fills its ICUs, the GOP is camouflaging a whispered confession beneath a cough. The partys admission is so quiet most Republicans cant even make it out themselves. But listen carefully to recent di… [+13475 chars]
